document_data.name: Arbenita Darkwind
document_data.mainbody: '''Arbenita Darkwind''', mostly known as '''Benita''', was an evil [[cleric]] of [[Malar]] in [[Undermountain]] in [[1375 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Benita led the [[human]] community inside the forest of [[Wyllowwood]]. She loved to hunt and kill personally the adventurers that arrived there. Benita personally dealt with [[Wyllow]].
document_data.History: Benita one day plunged into a ''[[portal]]'' that transported her to that section of Undermountain. She liked the place and founded a community there, using a place that was formerly a part of [[Melairbode]]. Later Benita befriended Wyllow.
document_data.Personality: Benita knew well that her community's survival depended upon the will of Wyllow and that, if enraged, the [[elf]] could trigger the arrival of an irate [[Halaster Blackcloak]].
